title: Oven Temp: Initial Value, Left Riemann Sum

content.question: Write an integral expression in terms of H for the average temperature of the oven between time t = 0 and time t = 16. Estimate the average temperature of the oven using a left Riemann sum with four subintervals of equal length. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

frqParts.text: Write an integral expression in terms of H for the average temperature of the oven between time t = 0 and time t = 16. Estimate the average temperature of the oven using a left Riemann sum with four subintervals of equal length. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
